content.rendered: So many fun things coming up, we can hardly stand it! News about the progress of our zip line course, our new guest story blog where you can post your own whitewater rafting and adventure stories and then post them on your Facebook page, chances to get free tshirts and hats sent to you, fun new whitewater rafting trips, discounts, and more! All coming soon! Stay tuned.

excerpt.rendered: So many fun things coming up, we can hardly stand it! News about the progress of our zip line course, our new guest story blog […]
